name: Digicah
shortDescription: A Digital Cards Against Humanity Clone
description: Digicah was developed as a C# .NET application using WPF for the client and a command line interface for the server. It has been released in alpha and can be downloaded from the dedicated Digicah website.

name: TodoDoingDone
shortDescription: An AJAX based Kanaban note management web app
description: TodoDoingDone was created out of self need for a simple, self contained, kabanan style, note management web application. Fully responsive with HTML5 drag and drop functionality and entire AJAX architecture made the creation a useful learning experience.

name: Wedding Website and Dashboard
shortDescription: Management Dashboard and Website for Wedding RSVP
description: Created in collaboration with Joe Devaney, This project allows for the creation of a wedding website portal with RSVP service for guests with a web app management dashboard for manging RSVPS and guests. The project is currently not available.

name: KIRK
shortDescription: A College Assignment To Create A Chatbot In C#
description: KIRK was created as a star trek based chatbot developed for command line access with C#. The resulting chatbot can be trained through conversation or via parsing of text files with full text-to-speech output.

name: TRON: Light Cycles
shortDescription: A Twitch Puzzle Game With Scalable Difficulty
description: TRON: Light Cycles was created as part of a college assignment to develop a game using Processing, a graphics framework and development environment created for Java. The difficulty can be scaled to suit the players skill level.

name: H2G2: Pixel Adventure
shortDescription: A Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy Game
description: This game was created with Sam Boles to compete in the national Games Fleadh event. It is a text Adventure with pixel art, some minigamesm, and story created by myself which won the Game Studios Ireland: Best in Original Story award.
